department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Maintenance on road surface at Timiskaming Quebec Dam Traffic Deck
description: Maintenance works to be completed within 9 weeks after contract award.
full_summary:
# Contract Notice: Timiskaming Quebec Dam Traffic Deck Wearing Surface

## Project Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the rehabilitation of the traffic deck wearing surface at the Timiskaming Dam in Quebec, Canada.

## Contract Details
- **Tender Reference Number:** WS4104451775-Doc4104499561
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4104451775
- **Publication Date**: 2023-07-18
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-22 14:00:00
- **Contract Award Date**: Not specified

## Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Capital Works and Maintenance
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Bidding (Open to All Interested Bidders)
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contractor Requirements
- ** Contractor Qualifications**: Exhibiting a proven track record of comparable experience in infrastructure construction and rehabilitation.
- **Bid Submission**: Must include all required supporting documentation.

## Contact Information
- **Procurement Authority**: Nabil Boujenoui, PSPC
- **Email:** [nabil.boujenoui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nabil.boujenoui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Project Website:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16909554?extsite=MTY5MDk1NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16909554?extsite=MTY5MDk1NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Important Notes
- **Closing Time Modification**: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by August 22, 2023 at 2:00PM. 
- **Enquiries and Communications**: Enquiries and other communications regarding the bid solicitation must be directed only to the Contracting Authority through the “Event Messages” tab within CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba). Failure to comply with this requirement may result in the bid being declared non-responsive. 

The procurement is open to all interested bidders, with the contract expected to be completed within 9 weeks after contract award
